FuncDef:
The npcc command displays the NPCC view.
The undo npcc command deletes all configurations in the NPCC view and disables the NPCC function. The npcc command displays the NPCC view. The undo npcc command deletes all configurations in the NPCC view and disables the NPCC function. By default, the NPCC function is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to enter the NPCC view and configure the NPCC function. In this way, the device can determine the congestion status on the network and proactively send CNP packets to the NIC of the source host, ensuring that the NIC reduces the packet sending rate in a timely manner.
